skins.shipDescription: Courageous-class aircraft carrier C Glorious, Hull Number 77.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the Royal Navy's heavy crui... *ahem* ex-cruiser, now aircraft carrier, Glorious! I was just being careless when I was sunk by Scharnhorst and Gneisenau, not because they're better than me!
skins.acquisition: Royal Navy large cruiC *ahem* aircraft carrier Glorious, reporting in! Commander, stand up straight, for your glory has arrived!
skins.login: Today is a good day. Good weather puts you in a good mood to get work done!
skins.details: Expect great things for me, for I am Glorious! Of... of course! I'll be your glory forever!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ardent and Acasta did the best they could, but I...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll be more prudent in the future. Only then can I avoid meeting disaster again!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, glory and courage go hand in hand. However, Courage isn't the same thing as recklessness.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, you're holding the glory of the Royal Navy

skins.shipDescription: Being able to occasionally have a peaceful school life... is something I could get used to. Commander, look at the markings on this butterfly - aren't they lovely?
I heard that the Sakura Empire's traditional attire was really hard to put on... but the Dragon's Empery's outfits are even more... Huh?! Commander, p-please look away!
